exmls.content:
<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="GameSceneSkin" width="450" height="800" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Image source="game_bg_jpg" x="-56"/>
	<e:Image id="startBtn" source="game_start_png" x="99" y="349"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="HomeSceneSkin" width="450" height="800" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Image id="bg" source="game_bg_jpg" x="-56"/>
	<e:Label id="msgLabel" text="标签" y="287" width="323" height="221" verticalAlign="middle" textAlign="center" textColor="0x050000" x="64" size="25"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="PreloadSceneSkin" width="450" height="800" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Image id="bg" source="game_bg_jpg" y="1" horizontalCenter="0"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="PCHomeSceneSkin" width="800" height="450" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Image source="game_bg_jpg" x="0" y="-1"/>
	<e:Image source="game_bg_jpg" y="1" x="563"/>
	<e:Label id="msgLabel" text="标签" width="340" height="183" verticalAlign="middle" textAlign="center" textColor="0x050000" x="202" y="32"/>
</e:Skin>
